I won this off E-bay last week, it was a impluse buy, as I thought I needed card, turns out I already had as a buyback. So I will sell for $23 dlvd (winning bid less original shipping) shipped w delivery confirmation. Card is SGC 30 with small crease and stain lower right corner, tiny wrinkle by cheek, see large scan. Paypal gift or check, money order.

SALE PENDING

Mike
